attributes.action: direct arrest of any US president who is in office where an illegal chemical weapon is used in a war zone "white phospherous"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is for the complete ban chemical weapons like white phospherous for even being used as an incendary weapon, if used the currently sering president should be charged and imprisoned.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
